'''1.21.10''' is a minor hotfix update to {{JE}} released on October 7, 2025,<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-java-edition-1-21-10|Minecraft Java Edition 1.21.10|October 7, 2025}}</ref> which fixes various bugs. It is compatible with [[1.21.9]] servers.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MC|fixedin=1.21.10 Release Candidate 1|otherissuescount=1
|;From released versions before 1.21
|211096|Entities in cobwebs clip through pistons.
|278182|Items glitch inside the piston head when pushed through powder snow or cobwebs.
|;From 1.21.9
|301916|The behavior of wind charges when colliding with certain blocks is different.
|302321|Chunks do not load while the player is being teleported.
|302383|Rooms with carpet on the floor cannot have maps in item frames placed on walls touching the floor.
|302405|Repeating (or chain) command block with any form of {{cmd|/tp [player]}} doesn't constantly tp player to one spot.
}}
* Fixed an issue that caused entities on bubble columns to fly high up into the air.

== Trivia ==
* This is the second full release version ever to have a minor version of '10', the first being [[Java Edition 1.7.10|1.7.10]].
** It is also the third ''Java Edition'' 1.''x''.10 release overall, following [[Java Edition Alpha v1.0.10|Alpha v1.0.10]] (2010) and [[Java Edition 1.7.10|1.7.10]] (2014).
* This is the first full release version to have 5 digits in its version number.
